Marlin and crew did a great job to restore my pool deck.  Well done!

Marlon did a very good job, he was very easy to talk to. Also very understanding and patient with me of how I wanted it to the tee. Overall, it turned out to be outstanding! I’ll definitely recommend him to my friends and anyone else in the Dallas area! 10/10 More

Marlon and his crew did a great job on my concrete overlay. He was patient during the process of picking colors and texture and was great at communicating dates and expectations. Will definitely use him again. More
